questions.q1: 1. What are the major pollutants that present in a restaurant / Cafe?
questions.q2: 2. How can I check the AQI of my restaurant using your device?
questions.q3: 3. What are the health impacts of the pollutants present inside the restaurants?
questions.q4: 4. Are any other parameters included in the monitors other than the air pollutants?
questions.q5: 5. What are some criteria that need to be kept in mind for a healthy and comfortable restaurant experience?
questions.q6: 6. Why is it necessary to have air quality monitoring solutions?
questions.q7: 7. Are there any additional benefits that come with the solutions?

answers.a1: Many pollutants can be present inside a typical restaurant or diner. CO2 and CO are the main pollutants followed by PM2.5, NO2, TVOCs, SO2, Noise, etc.
answers.a2: Prana Air Monitors are WiFi enabled so you don't need to set up a wire framework to extract and display the data. Simply connect the monitor to the dashboard through WiFi connectivity and view the real-time data on your screens.
answers.a3: Physical discomforts like headaches, nausea, dizziness, etc. among customers and staff.
answers.a4: Yes, you can monitor the temperature, noise, and humidity in an area.
answers.a5: Ventilation rate, noise, comfort level, mold score, organic aerosols, etc. are some of the criteria.
answers.a6: To know the nature of pollutants and by how much are they present in a restaurant so that necessary actions can be taken.
answers.a7: Customizable dashboard, 24*7 remote access to the data, get health tips, real-time and historical data analysis, QR code to scan and know the real-time AQI of that area, and many more.
